# Snatch Arrows (Ninja Trick)
## Overview
*Snatch Arrows:* A ninja who selects this ninja trick gains the [[Snatch Arrows (Feat)|Snatch Arrows]] feat as a bonus feat. The ninja must have the [[Improved Unarmed Strike (Feat)|Improved Unarmed Strike]] feat and the [[Deflect Arrows (Feat)|Deflect Arrows]] feat before taking this trick.

**Source:** Ultimate Combat, pg. 16
